text: "This makes me sad.  Automate your tests.  If you are going to build microservices spaghetti at least make it tested spaghetti." #WTFIsCloudNative @holly_cummins https://t.co/LWniVucUnb

author.description: Editor In Chief at Container Solutions, host of the "Hacking the org" podcast, freelance tech writer, 1/2 of Twofish. I'd rather be making music.
author.name: Charles Humble (@charleshumble@mastodon.social)
